row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_RM.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JSON_BODY_FOR_BASIC_PROPERTIES
row.description: Build Json body for basic properties

row.process:
:SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """name"": ""&UC4RB_ETT_NAME#"",")
:SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """folder"": {") :SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """name"": ""&UC4RB_ETT_FOLDER#""") :SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, "},")
:IF &UC4RB_ETT_OWNER# <> "" : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """owner"": {") : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """name"": ""&UC4RB_ETT_OWNER#""") : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, "},") :ENDIF
: IF "&UC4RB_ETT_DESC#" <> "" : SET &REQUEST_BODY# = STR_CAT(&REQUEST_BODY#, """description"": ""&UC4RB_ETT_DESC#"",") : ENDIF
